actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat adoption expenses in the same manner as medical expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for adoption expenses on the same basis as deductions are currently allowed for medical or dental expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat adoption expenses in the same manner as medical expenses.
